forum.name: Reflecting on Session 4.3
forum.intro:
In Session 4.3, we focused on the building blocks of linear functions—expressions, t-tables, and graphs. We also considered teacher moves, such as questioning, and the impact these moves had on cognitive demand and productive struggle in an adult education class.

What might you consider doing differently with your own group of learners based on what you learned in Session 4.3? Why? Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to share your thoughts in the discussion forum below.

Be sure to read others’ postings and respond to at least one other participant. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.) You can endorse posted ideas or reflect on your own experience when responding.
